item.title: Trump Opens ANWR to Oil Drilling
item.description: The Interior Department also said it would allow a contentious road to be built through the Izembek National Wildlife Refuge in southwestern Alaska.

item.title: Archbishop of U.S. Anglican Church Is Accused of Sexual Harassment
item.description: Another leader in the breakaway denomination has been accused of responding slowly to accusations of abuse and grooming against a lay leader.
